trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There was one other sighting in Toronto on or around March 14th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approx 0120 ET on Mar 14 a slightly less intensity than a street light, but about the same size, yellow to white spectrum light appeared in the sky about 4 city blocks away. It quickly continued straight down, or away, for a duration shorter than 3 seconds (approx) and appeared to "burn out" as an ember would from a BBQ fire. It was a straight line. Conditions are cloudy, overcast, with "fuzzy sky" but clear near the surface. Initial Thoughts: Thought for a moment it was a low flying plane... After Thoughts: Perhaps it was a meteor... Conclusion: Reported to substantiate any additional reports only. Not enough information alone... Location: McCowan & Hwy 401 in Scarborough (community within Toronto) Ontario Canada. Viewed from 23rd floor of Apt building to the NE of the apparent "light source".
